quoteText: Sixth grade was a big time, in my childhood, of hoops and friendship, and coming up with funny things.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I sang a song at my sister's wedding. My mother forced me into that, too. But that one felt all right.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: When the kids are laughing in the audience, I tear up, I'm so happy I did a nice thing.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: My comedy is different every time I do it. I don't know what the hell I'm doing.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: In high school I wanted to be a rock star and was in a lot of bands.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I shouldn't be near Vegas and have money in my pocket.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I'm not looking to get away from anything. I like what I've done. I like what I get to do and I enjoy working with my friends. I loved those movies, but this is incredible.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: When I'm around the kids I feel like I act the most grown-up just because you're supposed to. And I say things, like every other day, that remind me of my own parents.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I definitely connected to the fact that life gets out of control and you end up doing things and wishing you were doing other things instead.
author: Adam Sandler
